addr: 1900 Avenue of the Stars. 7th Floor. Los Angeles, CA 90067
title: GLA-ARMA Legal Round Table - Century City 12/15
desc: GLA ARMA currently offers Round Table sessions for  LEGAL / LAW FIRMS.  These sessions are for  RIM Professionals working in Law Firms or corporate legal depart-ments . RIM Professionals from the Corporate or Government sectors are welcome to join. These groups will meet monthly or bi-monthly.  The sessions are typically open discussion or topics chosen by the groups.  Vendors may be included on an invitation basis for specific discussions .  ? This is a brown bag event, so please bring your own lunch. Drinks will be provided by the host.
